name: DoTheCount
description:
DoTheCount  is a simple puzzle game which focuses on mental math (sums operations only for this prototype ).

The prototype is completely open source , if you know how to use unity you can fork the project from the github repo and add your own levels or even your own mechanics.

Rules :

Move from the initial square (green) to the end square (red).

The sum of  the squares's values used, should be equal to the value of  the end square.

Controls:

Use arrows to move.

Press ESC to restart Board.

Credits : 

Sounds used in the prototype made by RobinLamb from OpenGameArt.org .
